description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'GameBoard' which represents the UI for a Tic-Tac-Toe game board. It includes layout, styling, and interaction logic for rendering the game grid, handling user taps on cells, and highlighting winning lines.

classes.name: GameBoard
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays the Tic-Tac-Toe game board, handling layout, styling, and user interactions.

classes.name: _TappableCell
classes.description: A private helper widget that provides tap interaction and hover cursor styling for each cell.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the game board UI, including layout calculations and cell rendering.
